data.title: Rahul Mahajan and Dimpy Mahajan officially divorced on February 25
data.meta_description: We can just say, we wish Rahul and Dimpy share a strong bond of friendship and live a happy life with their loved ones. - Rahul Mahajan and Dimpy Mahajan officially divorced on February 25
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
We can just say, we wish Rahul and Dimpy share a strong bond of friendship and live a happy life with their loved ones.

Rahul Mahajan, businessman and TV host and a politician’s son, met his love Dimpy Mahajan through TV reality show Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega and the duo decided to get married in 2009. But things soon turned rocky in what was Rahul’s second marriage, and Rahul and Dimpy separated. On February 25, 2015, the former lovers officially divorced. There was a court hearing and Rahul posted on Twitter soon after, a clear cut statement about he being just friends with Dimpy from now on. (Read: Bigg Boss Halla Bol: Casanova Rahul Mahajan denies dating model Aparna Joshi!)

From today onwards we are “just” friends @dimpy_mahajanpic.twitter.com/EXc9UeZ1tm

— Rahul Mahajan (@TheRahulMahajan) February 25, 2015

After Rahul and Dimpy’s grand swayamwar on national television through the reality show, audiences came across several breaking news stories about their relationship. Soon after the swayamwar, Dimpy filed a domestic violence case against husband Rahul. After this case was filed, it seemed neither Rahul nor Dimpy were happy in their so-called marriage.

But soon, audiences witnessed the lovebirds in Nach Baliye 5 dance reality show. They entered the show to entertain audiences and also to resolve their personal problems. After this show, Rahul and Dimpy never made a public appearance as a jodi, which became very evident and topic for gossip among their fans. But the fighting pair was seen in Bigg Boss 8 in 2014, although by now the two were staying separately.

In Bigg Boss 8, it was finally revealed that Rahul and Dimpy have finally moved on and there’s nothing between them apart from simple friendship. Audiences desired to view some romantic and awww moments between Rahul and Dimpy, but Rahul was seen flirting with Karishma Tanna instead in the Bigg Boss 8 house.

We can just say, we wish Rahul and Dimpy share a strong bond of friendship and live a happy life with their loved ones.

Edited by Shweta Parande
